sub_tasks.requirements: Gender Selection: Filters the patient cohort to include only females (p.gender = 'F').
Age Range Selection: Correctly filters for patients aged between 35 and 45 using p.anchor_age BETWEEN 35 AND 45.
First Admission Identification: Uses a window function ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY subject_id ORDER BY admittime ASC) to rank admissions chronologically for each patient.
First Admission Filtering: Correctly filters for the first admission using the rank generated by the window function (e.g., admission_rank = 1).
CABG Procedure Identification: Identifies CABG procedures by correctly selecting both ICD-9 (LIKE '361%') and ICD-10 (LIKE '021%') codes.
Patient-Admission Join: Correctly joins the patients table with the FirstAdmissions CTE on subject_id to link demographics with admission data.
Admission-Procedure Join: Correctly joins the FirstAdmissions CTE with the procedures_icd table on hadm_id to link procedures to the specific first admission.
Mortality Rate Calculation: Correctly calculates the in-hospital mortality rate by applying the AVG() function to the hospital_expire_flag column.
